org.activity.objects

Class Timeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.activity.objects.Timeline
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimelineWithNext

    public class Timeline
extends java.lang.Object
    Timeline is a chronological sequence of Activity Objects
    Author:
    gunjan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Timeline()
      Create an empty timeline
      Timeline(java.util.ArrayList<ActivityObject> activityObjects)
      Create Timeline from given Activity Objects
      Timeline(java.lang.Integer id, java.util.ArrayList<ActivityObject> arrOs)
      Create a Timeline with give ID and list of ActivityObjects
      Timeline(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,UserDayTimeline> dayTimelines)
      Creates a Timeline consisting of the Activity Objects from the given LinkedHashMap of UserDayTimelines thus essentially converts mulitple day timelines into a single continuous single timeline
      Timeline(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,UserDayTimeline> dayTimelines, int timelineID)
      Creates a Timeline consisting of the Activity Objects from the given LinkedHashMap of UserDayTimelines thus essentially converts mulitple day timelines into a single continuous single timeline with given ID for the timeline
      Timeline(UserDayTimeline dayTimeline)
      Create Timeline from a given UserDayTimeline

      • Timeline

        public Timeline(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,UserDayTimeline> dayTimelines)
        Creates a Timeline consisting of the Activity Objects from the given LinkedHashMap of UserDayTimelines thus essentially converts mulitple day timelines into a single continuous single timeline
        Parameters:
        dayTimelines - LinkedHashMap of UserDayTimelines

      • Timeline

        public Timeline(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,UserDayTimeline> dayTimelines,
                int timelineID)
        Creates a Timeline consisting of the Activity Objects from the given LinkedHashMap of UserDayTimelines thus essentially converts mulitple day timelines into a single continuous single timeline with given ID for the timeline
        Parameters:
        dayTimelines -
        timelineID - this can be the user id to whom the timeline belongs or any another identifier relevant for the need.

      • getActivityObjectsBetweenTime

        public java.util.ArrayList<ActivityObject> getActivityObjectsBetweenTime(java.sql.Timestamp startTimestampC,
                                                                         java.sql.Timestamp endTimestampC)
        Returns Activity Objects falling between given start time and end time (all activity objects intersecting this starttime-endtime interval is included. note: if you want to find activity object at time t, make start and end timestamp equal upto the resolution (usually seconds) required.
        Parameters:
        startTimestampC -
        endTimestampC -
        verbose -
        Returns:
